text: J. D.'s Revenge is a 1976 American action horror movie directed by Arthur Marks and starring Glynn Turman, Louis Gossett Jr., Nigel Davenport, Joan Pringle, Julian Christopher, Earl Billings. It was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 action movies Category:1976 horror movies Category:American action movies Category:American horror movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in New Orleans
title: J. D.'s Revenge
